formattedAddress: 1160 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1160 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128-1212, USA

originalText.text:
I have been a patient of Dr. Plancher for over 15 years and he and his entire Staff have been excellent providing outstanding care.

Dr. Plancher is very thorough in his assessment of the whole person not just your injury, this set him apart from others.

I value his expertise and trust his diagnosis, and plan of treatment from pre-surgery to total rehabilitation.

Thank you Dr. Plancher for treating my knee injuries recently with have a partial knee replacement in one leg and a complete replacement of the knee in my other leg,  These procedures have made walking a comfortable experience once again!

Hist staff is outstanding and goes above and beyond to make the  administrative side of the procedure easy as possible coordinating all aspects of the treatment plan.

I highly recommend Dr. Plancher and his staff to my friends and family for their orthopedic and surgical needs

originalText.text: I’ve been going to Dr. Plancher for many years and have had two meniscus repairs and I’m amazed how much better I feel and the years of activity I have been blessed to have.  I’m extremely active in the mountains and depend on my legs.  Anyone serious about getting better, come see Dr Plancher !!

text.text: I’ve been going to Dr. Plancher for many years and have had two meniscus repairs and I’m amazed how much better I feel and the years of activity I have been blessed to have.  I’m extremely active in the mountains and depend on my legs.  Anyone serious about getting better, come see Dr Plancher !!

originalText.text: Dr. Planner gave me a new ACL 22 years ago and I was back to marathon training in 3 months. I moved from NYC to New Hampshire but he and his office have stayed in touch to check in. I actually just saw him yesterday to see how it was holding up and he says the MRI/CT/Xrays show that it looks amazing. I was not surprised as, now at 50, I’m not hindered at all - cycling, skiing even some occasional basketball! I lucked out when I got an appointment with Dr. Plancher and his team and I’m grateful to still be in contact. He cares so much about his patients and his passion for his work is unmatched.

originalText.text: I have received excellent diagnoses, procedures and care at Plancher Orthopaedics & Sports Medicine. Dr. Plancher has performed two unicompartmental knee replacements (2006 and 2014), and a shoulder replacement (2018). I am pain free with complete range of motion in each joint since each surgical procedure, and fully capable in my chosen activities. Terrific staff, great followup and guidance throughout.

text.text: I have received excellent diagnoses, procedures and care at Plancher Orthopaedics & Sports Medicine. Dr. Plancher has performed two unicompartmental knee replacements (2006 and 2014), and a shoulder replacement (2018). I am pain free with complete range of motion in each joint since each surgical procedure, and fully capable in my chosen activities. Terrific staff, great followup and guidance throughout.

originalText.text: I had ACL/meniscus surgery with Dr Plancher in 2011 and could not be happier. The surgery was a complete success - I still ski and play tennis to this day - and the care I received from the practice could not have been better.  He is a great surgeon with an exceptionally efficient and customer service oriented practice. He is the only doctor I ever had who reaches out proactively to make sure I am still doing great.
